MODULE.name: Camera
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: The Camera API provides access to your device's Camera(s)
MODULE.MORE_HELP: Use this API to give users the ability to take a photo via one of the device's cameras and return it to the application. Photos can either be stored on the device and optionally transfered to an online server using the Network API or can be returned as a DataURI object for storing or display.

PROPERTIES.DESC: These properties are used to configure the Camera.

PROPERTY.name: maxWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: The maximum width of images which can be captured.

PROPERTY.name: maxHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: The maximum height of images which can be captured.

PROPERTY.name: desiredWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: Camera hardware is limited to taking photos in a finite number of resolutions, eg 2048x1536, 640x480 etc. Specifying a desiredWidth will request to take the photo with the specified width but if it is not supported by the hardware then the closest match will be selected. The callback received when a photo is taken contains the actual resolution of the captured photo.

PROPERTY.name: desiredHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: Camera hardware is limited to taking photos in a finite number of resolutions, eg 2048x1536, 640x480 etc. Specifying a desiredHeight will request to take the photo with the specified height but if it is not supported by the hardware then the closest match will be selected. The callback received when a photo is taken contains the actual resolution of the captured photo.

PROPERTY.name: compressionFormat
PROPERTY.APPLIES: JPG is supported on all devices, Windows Mobile does not support PNG images
PROPERTY.DESC: The format of the captured image in subsequent calls to takePicture(). If you do not define this property when you use choose_picture with iOS, the type of image in Gallery will be recognized, and the same format will be used for saving the image to applications data.

PROPERTY.name: outputFormat
PROPERTY.DESC: Specifies the way to return the captured image to the application

VALUE.DESC: The captured image is stored on the device. The callback associated with takePicture will contain the location of the image.
Image will be returned as a Data URI object, this is a base 64 encoding of the image and can be used to easily embed the image on the page or store the image in a database.

PROPERTY.name: colorModel
PROPERTY.DESC: Where supported by the hardware this property can be used to select whether to capture a color or a grayscale image.

PROPERTY.name: enableEditing
PROPERTY.DESC: Enables post photo capture image customizing; image will captured reduced to screen size (not full size).

PROPERTY.name: flashMode
PROPERTY.DESC: Specifies the flash behaviour when taking a picture

VALUE.DESC: Flash will be used if lighting conditions deem it necessary
Flash with red eye reduction is used
The flash is turned on in torch mode

PROPERTY.name: saveToSharedGallery
PROPERTY.DESC: If true, the picture you take will be added to the camera roll.

PROPERTY.name: captureSound
PROPERTY.DESC: Path to a sound file resident on the device which will be played when the image is captured.

PROPERTY.name: previewLeft
PROPERTY.DESC: In cases where the resident camera application on the device is not used this API is used to control the position of the viewfinder preview window when taking a photo.

PROPERTY.name: previewTop
PROPERTY.DESC: In cases where the resident camera application on the device is not used this API is used to control the position of the viewfinder preview window when taking a photo.

PROPERTY.name: previewWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: In cases where the resident camera application on the device is not used this API is used to control the position of the viewfinder preview window when taking a photo.

PROPERTY.name: previewHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: In cases where the resident camera application on the device is not used this API is used to control the position of the viewfinder preview window when taking a photo.

METHOD.name: enumerate
METHOD.DESC: Returns the cameras present on your device, allowing you to access your device's front or back camera.

METHOD.name: getCameraByType
METHOD.DESC: Returns the camera of requested type if that camera exist - else return nil

PARAM.name: cameraType
PARAM.DESC: cameraType: main or front

RETURN.DESC: Camera with requested type or nil if not have requested type camera

METHOD.name: takePicture
METHOD.DESC: Start the camera appliction to take a picture. The user can capture the displayed image either by interacting with the resident camera app or pressing the trigger or enter key, depending on the device in use.

PARAM.name: propertyMap
PARAM.DESC: Provide a set of properties to configure the camera, for example to specify the flashMode or compressionFormat

CAN_BE_NIL.DESC: Not providing properties to this function will use the Camera's default properties, or those previlusly set on the Camera instance

PARAM.name: status
PARAM.DESC: Whether or not the image was successfully captured. The returned string will be one of 'ok', 'cancel' or 'error'.

PARAM.name: imageUri
PARAM.DESC: If the specified 'outputFormat' was 'image' then this field is the URI to the taken image stored on the device, this image will have an auto-generated name. If the specified 'outputFormat' was 'dataUri' then this field will be the image encoded as a Data URI.

PARAM.name: imageHeight
PARAM.DESC: The actual height of the image that was captured, this may differ from the requested height as the Camera will only support a finite number of resolutions.

PARAM.name: imageWidth
PARAM.DESC: The actual width of the image that was captured, this may differ from the requested width as the Camera will only support a finite number of resolutions.

PARAM.name: imageFormat
PARAM.DESC: The format in which the image was captured, either 'png' or 'jpg'.

PARAM.name: message
PARAM.DESC: If the returned status is 'error' then this field will contain more information on the error.

PARAM.name: image_uri
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageUri in preference to this parameter

PARAM.name: image_height
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageHeight in preference to this parameter

PARAM.name: image_width
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageWidth in preference to this parameter

PARAM.name: image_format
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageFormat in preference to this parameter

METHOD.name: choosePicture
METHOD.DESC: Choose a picture from the album

PARAM.name: propertyMap
PARAM.DESC: Provide a set of properties to configure the camera, for example to specify the flashMode or compressionFormat

CAN_BE_NIL.DESC: Not providing properties to this function will use the Camera's default properties, or those previlusly set on the Camera instance

PARAM.name: status
PARAM.DESC: Whether or not the image was successfully chosen from the gallery. The returned string will be one of 'ok', 'cancel' or 'error'.

PARAM.name: imageUri
PARAM.DESC: The URI to the chosen image.

PARAM.name: imageHeight
PARAM.DESC: The height of the image.

PARAM.name: imageWidth
PARAM.DESC: The width of the image.

PARAM.name: imageFormat
PARAM.DESC: The format of the image, either 'png' or 'jpg'.

PARAM.name: message
PARAM.DESC: If the returned status is 'error' then this field will contain more information on the error.

PARAM.name: image_uri
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageUri in preference to this parameter

PARAM.name: image_height
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageHeight in preference to this parameter

PARAM.name: image_width
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageWidth in preference to this parameter

PARAM.name: image_format
PARAM.DESC: It is recommended to use imageFormat in preference to this parameter

METHOD.name: saveImageToDeviceGallery
METHOD.DESC: Save an image to the device gallery

PARAM.name: pathToImage
PARAM.DESC: The real path to the image that is to be saved in the device gallery. You need to use the RhoApplication method get_blob_path to have the real path, such as Rho::RhoApplication::get_blob_path(img.image_uri).
